docs.text: Part 1 Create an Assisted-Installer cluster instance and download the discovery ISO ¶ Download OCM token from your account echo "Token String From OCM API Token Link Above" > ~/ocm-token Download your pull secret and save it in a file: pull-secret.json Refresh your token . refreshToken.sh Set and source your variables . variables.sh Create your deployment data from template . create-deployment-data.sh Create cluster draft using the Assisted Installer API . create-cluster-draft.sh Generate the ISO to download . generator-iso.sh Download the ISO . download-iso.sh Part 2 Create VM using Discovery ISO ¶ Part 3 Finish Openshift install using Assisted Installer API ¶
docs.title: Test

docs.text: Download OCM token from your account echo "Token String From OCM API Token Link Above" > ~/ocm-token Download your pull secret and save it in a file: pull-secret.json Refresh your token . refreshToken.sh Set and source your variables . variables.sh Create your deployment data from template . create-deployment-data.sh Create cluster draft using the Assisted Installer API . create-cluster-draft.sh Generate the ISO to download . generator-iso.sh Download the ISO . download-iso.sh
